description:
Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act to vary the wording of condition 15 (hours of servicing of the commercial units) of planning permission P091840 dated 20 April 2010. Planning permission P091840 was also an application under s73 of the Town and Country Planning Act for: a) minor material amendments; b) removal or variation of conditions and also c) variation to the original S106 (legal) agreement of planning permission ref: P051176 dated 2 May 2006 for the 'erection of a new part 5 storey/part 6 storey building with basement and rooftop plant enclosure, containing a supermarket and mixed commercial space (A1- retail/A2- financial and professional services/A3- restaurants/A4- drinking establishments/A5- takeaways/ B1 - offices/D1 non-residential institutions/D2- assembly and leisure uses) at basement and ground floors; 2,300sq m of office space; 69 flats (including 35% affordable housing); and raised garden at first floor level.'
 The application seeks to vary the hours of servicing (for Waitrose only) to: 07:00 and 19:00 hours Monday to Saturday and 09:00 and 17:00 on Sunday. No change is sought for the servicing hours of the remaining commercial units.
 This application may affect the character and appearance of the conservation area.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); section 73.
